item.title: Financial advisors are turning to this asset class for diversification and stability as uncertainty rocks markets

item.title: The big rally in this chip stock seems to have some legs, according to the charts
Stocks that outperform and underperform following a 15% oil spike, according to history
item.description: If history is any guide, the recent spike in oil should leave investors wanting to dump or short shares of automakers and buy some tech stocks.
